channel.title: Index on Ilm Fruits
channel.description: Recent content in Index on Ilm Fruits

item.title: Salat101 now on Ilmfruits!
item.description: Bismillah walhamdolilah wasalatu wasalam ‘ala Rasool Allah Asalamu ‘alaikum wa rahmatullahi wa barakatahu, In efforts to bring people closer to their salat a service was created entitled, “Salat101″. Alhamdolilah, by the grace of Allah azza wa jal this has been a great success and inshallah it will be now available on Ilmfruits! Periodically, we will send out tips and tricks which inshallah ta’ala will aid us all in attaining ihsan in our salat.
